title: LF Rioters to get involved
body:
Hello!

Tonight at around 6pm sydney time we were due to have some very famous people play with some of our community, but they are super busy and arent able to commit now!

So we would love it if rioters could get involved and play with the people who were finalists in our Oceanic Gaming League, which was completed last night!

If you can join us itd make my year and itll be a LOAD of fun to play!

Please and Thank you.

replies.body:
Hey,

Will jump in later tonight for a game or two.
